DialogueOption.Text: Is there anything else to explore here?
Do you know what it does?
You remind me of my friend Riebeck who loves ancient architecture.
Just saying hi.

Dialogue.Page: Anything else you want to tell me?

DialogueOption.Text: Is there anything else to explore here?
Do you know what it does?
You remind me of my friend Riebeck who loves ancient architecture.
Just saying hi.

Dialogue.Page: Not much on or below the surface, no. I do have a camp south of here, but it's just a tent, some things i found, and a campfire.
There is however a space station floating just above the planet. Since our home got terraformed, it's just been abandoned.

DialogueOption.Text: I've been there, that's where I came from.

Dialogue.Page: You have? What was in there? How did you get in? i thought the place was sealed off!

DialogueOption.Text: I went through a few of those treacherous Bramble Dimensions after discovering it in my home system.

Dialogue.Page: Hmmm...so the only way in is to go through those "Bramble Dimensions" you say?

DialogueOption.Text: Yes, and watch out for Quantum Anglerfish!

Dialogue.Page: Alright blue-skin. I'll give it a shot! I fear no fish!

DialogueOption.Text: Good luck...

Dialogue.Page: I do not, and you can probably tell by my curiosity. I've never seen anything like this before, but it looks like something our ancestors built.

DialogueOption.Text: What's your theory on this place?

Dialogue.Page: The only thing I can make of it, is that it's some sort of machine with sockets. The symbols on them might be where to find them...

DialogueOption.Text: I'll let you know if I find anything.
I found the seal! It was right by your camp.

Dialogue.Page: So THAT'S what that thing was...I found that thing the other day, but when I found this structure today, I completely forgot about that slab you found.

DialogueOption.Text: And a hologram symbol shows up when I insert it.

Dialogue.Page: I have no idea what it could mean. We use those symbols for a lot of things. Maybe it'll be clearer if you find the rest.
Me? Pfft, no I don't care about architecture. Actually, at home I'm known as my kind's demolition expert.

DialogueOption.Text: You sound fascinated with the structure in front of you...
I think your star will beat you to that soon...

Dialogue.Page: Sure, but not because I am fascinated with architecture, but because you don't see this every day.
To be fair, wouldn't this make just anyone's brain start ticking?

DialogueOption.Text: Yeah, fair enough.

Dialogue.Page: Well little guy, let me know if you figure anything out.

DialogueOption.Text: I will!

Dialogue.Page: Oh yeah? Well I know and I don't care!

DialogueOption.Text: (This one's just like the rest of them...)
